name: Holiday Heist (Keeya)
description:
Holiday Heist!

Steal gifts for your kits to play with them... that's what foxes do, right?
(low poly game made over Christmas 2021)

Controls: wasd + space (jump) + F/mouse1 (snath and drop gift) + shift (sprint)

Steal gifts and bring them to your kits' cave. Destroy decorations for extra score (and time penalty), snatch them quickly to get bonus score from remaining time.

Created by Keeya and Rengyr.
